Title: Replaces the terms father, mother, and filiation to gender neutral language; repealer
Summary: Replaces the terms father, mother, and filiation to gender neutral language.
LawCode: Rpld §562, amd Fam Ct Act, generally; amd R4518, CPLR; amd §§75-a, 111-b, 240, 244-b, 244-c & 244-d, Dom Rel L; amd §256, Exec L; amd §90, Judy L; amd Soc Serv L, generally; amd §3-503, Gen Ob L; amd §510, V & T L; amd §119, ABC L; amd §6509-c, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the civil practice law and rules, the domestic relations law, the executive law, the judiciary law, the social services law, the general obligations law, the vehicle and traffic law, the alcoholic beverage control law, and the education law, in relation to substituting parentage for paternity and filiation; and to repeal certain provisions of the family court act relating thereto
